entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
